participant_1.background:
My favorite place to eat is a local cafe where I can get a cup of green tea and watch my favorite superhero shows.
I once had to put down my beloved dog, and it was one of the hardest things I've ever done.
I'm going to be working on my juice business and creating some new content for my YouTube channel.
i tend to aruge with myself more than i argue with myself.
i couldn t live without my cell phone.

i love to paint pictures.
I'm a potter, and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
I am proud of my first movie, even though it is not perfect.
i watch youtube videos.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks! I'm just getting ready to head to the cafe to get some coffee and watch some superhero shows.
Oh nice! I love superhero shows! What's your favorite one?
I'm a big fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe, so my favorite show is probably the "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.". What's your favorite one?
I'm a big fan of the DC Universe, so my favorite show is probably "The Flash".
Oh nice! I've heard good things about that show. I've never actually seen it, but I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun. Do you have any other hobbies besides watching superhero shows?
I also like to paint pictures and play video games.
Oh cool! I love to paint pictures too. What kind of pictures do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and still lifes. I also like to do some abstract painting sometimes.
Oh nice! I like to paint portraits and animals. I also like to do some abstract painting sometimes.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'd love to see some of your paintings sometime.
Sure! I'd love to show you some of mine.
Great! I'll DM you my contact info.
